mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT INSTRUMENT FROM TAG WHERE GENRE = #{genre}
SELECT DISTINCT SCAPE FROM TAG WHERE GENRE = #{genre}
SELECT DISTINCT DETAIL FROM TAG WHERE GENRE = #{genre}
SELECT DISTINCT Fx FROM TAG WHERE GENRE = #{genre}

SELECT s.source_no, s.source_name, s.bpm, s.key, t.tag_no, t.genre, p.pack_no, pi.pack_img_storedname, pi.pack_img_originname, sf.file_originname, sf.file_storedname FROM source S INNER JOIN tag t on s.tag_no = t.tag_no INNER JOIN pack p on s.pack_no = p.pack_no INNER JOIN packimginfo pi on p.pack_no = pi.pack_no INNER JOIN sourcefileinfo sf on s.source_no = sf.source_no WHERE t.genre = #{genre} order by source_no
SELECT count(*) chk FROM SOURCE_LIKE WHERE user_no = #{userNo} and source_no = #{sourceNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE SOURCE_LIKE WHERE SOURCE_NO = #{sourceNo} and USER_NO = #{userNo}
